name: Sheriff Unchained
description:
This game was made on Godot during the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by three people!

Sheriff Unchained is a scoring game where you're playing as a sheriff who needs to catch prisoners and take them back to your office. The more you bring back at the same time, the more points you earn. But beware, the more they are, the more they will slow you down!

You can let them behind chained as to not be hindered by them but if you take too long to come back, they may take profit of that time alone to free themselves and run away!

Controls:

A is used to go left. 

D is used to go right.

W is used to jump.

E is used for various actions :

   - If used on a chained prisoner, you take them with you.

   - If you have already taken prisoners and there's no other chained prisoner around, you will unchain them.

   - If you're close to your office, pressing E will put them all in jail and get you points.

Long press on left click to throw your lasso and catch those bad guys.

Made by (alphabetic order):

Casadon (level design) - https://casadon.itch.io/

Dupy (developer) - https://dupy.itch.io/

Play Dash (artist) - https://play-dash.itch.io/
